existing_features.title: Make the Profile (user) dropdown menu background fully opaque (no transparency/glass effect), matching the screenshot issue: the area behind the user bar/profile dropdown should not be see-through.
Apply the same fully opaque background treatment to the Notifications dropdown so both top-right dropdowns have consistent non-transparent surfaces.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove transparency behind the user bar/user section background; use a solid dark background (no transparent look as in the photo).

projectName: Remove transparency behind user/profile bar dropdown (solid background)
